name: generic_inference
description: This is a fake software generic_inference.

build: echo Build generic_inference for the {system.name} in {software.build_dir}

build.name: -Dinference_runner_MODEL_TFLITE_PATH=
build.description: Full file name for a custom model. Model must be in tflite format compiled with Vela.

build.name: -DCPU_PROFILE_ENABLED=
build.description: Selects whether CPU profiling (for ML workload) is enabled or not.
